import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from 'axios'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Pos = ({ setToken, setType, mobile, token }) => { const [post, setpost] = useState('') const [cart, setcart] = useState({}) const getpost = async () => { try { const { data } = await axios({ url: 'http://localhost:4000/get_products', method: 'POST', headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", "Authorization": "Bearer " + token }, }) if (data.status == 'login') { setType('logout') setToken('') return } setpost(data.products) console.log(data.products) } catch (error) { console.log(error.response.data.status) if (error.response.data.status == 'login') { setType('logout') setToken('') return } } } useEffect(() => { console.log(token) window.scrollTo(0, 0) getpost(); }, []) return (
Products
Cart
{cart.length != 0 && cart.map((c, index) => ( )) }
Name Price Quantity
{c.name} {c.price} {c.quantity}
); }; export default Pos;
